assemblyInfo.assemblyMethod: FALCON v. 1.3.0; FALCON-Unzip v. 1.2.0; purge_dups v. github ca23030ccf4254dfd2d3a5ea90d0eed41c24f88b; bionano Solve v. 3.4_06042019a; Salsa2 HiC v. 2.2; Arrow polishing and gap filling v. SMRTLink7.0.1; Longranger Align v. 2.2.2; freebayes v. 1.3.1; gEVAL manual curation v. 2020-02-04; VGP assembly pipeline v. 1.6

bioprojects.title: Anguilla anguilla (European eel) genome, fAngAng1, alternate haplotype

description.comment: The European eel (Anguilla anguilla) is a true eel, found around European coast, and are currently critically endangered, down to 2% of their historical population, due to water pollution. They can live up to be over 80 years old in captivity, the oldest recorded animal being 155 years. This sample was collected by Nidal Karagic, procured by Axel Meyer, sequencing supported by Gene Myers, in collaboration with Richard Durbin, to generate a high-quality reference genome as part of the G10K-VGP and Fish VGP projects.
description.title: Animal sample from Anguilla anguilla

sampleIds.label: Sample name
sampleIds.value: European eel sample for G10K-VGP reference genome

assemblyInfo.comments: This assembly represents the alternate haplotype of the diploid genome Anguilla anguilla. The principal haplotype sequences are in WGS project JABVMG000000000
assemblyInfo.sequencingTech: PacBio Sequel I CLR; Illumina NovaSeq; Arima Genomics Hi-C; Bionano Genomics DLS
